snippet: Campaigning in Colorado a day before the state caucuses, Newt Gingrich says neither he nor Rick Santorum will drop out to give the other a better chance against Mitt Romney.
abstract: Campaigning in Colorado a day before the state caucuses, Newt Gingrich says neither he nor Rick Santorum will drop out to give the other a better chance against Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Gingrich Says Neither He Nor Santorum Will Leave Race
